data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mortelmans, Jonas, Tomasovic, Guy, Nagy, Zoltán Tamás (2014): A remarkable new species of Paraphamartania Engel from Portugal (Diptera, Asilidae). Zootaxa 3814 (3): 409-418, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3814.3.8
